get.summary: Get all promises in an account

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

post.summary: Add a new promise. At least 1 payment is required

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

put.summary: Update a promise. Will not update payments

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

delete.summary: Cancel a specific promise for the account

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

delete.summary: Delete a payment from a promise.  Will fail if promise only has 1 payment or promise is not open

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

post.summary: Add a new payment to an existing promise

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

post.summary: Login to the Collections Public API with an API Key and Secret Key. Returns a Session Key if successful.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: A request object containing the API Key and Secret Key to use in order to log in.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization token received from the /login POST.  The format must be: "Bearer <token>"

accountStatus.description: Contains information indicating the current status of the account.

accountTypeId.description: Contains value related to account type.

activeFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account is active.

amountLastPaid.description: Contains the amount of payment most recently received.

assignedQueueId.description: Contains information identifying the queue to which the account was assigned.

balance.description: Contains the current unpaid balance of the account.

bankruptcyFlag.description: Contains an idicator that the account is included in a bankruptcy.

branch.description: Contains information identifying the branch office.

brokenPromiseFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the most recent promise to pay was not kept.

closedDate.description: Contains the date on which the account was closed.

closedFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account is closed.

creditLimit.description: Contains the maximum credit limit for the account.

dateLastPaid.description: Contains the date on which the most recent payment was received.

dateLastUpdated.description: Account info table date last paid.

dateOpened.description: Contains the date on which the account was opened.

daysDQ.description: Contains the number of days the account is delinquent.

daysSincePayment.description: Contains the count of the number of days since the most recent payment was received.

delinquentDate.description: Contains the date on which the account became delinquent.

delinquentFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account is delinquent.

description.description: Contains a description of the account.

descriptionAbbrev.description: Contains an abbreviated description of the account.

dqAmount.description: Contains the amount that is delinquent

dqCountLTD.description: Contains the number of times the account has been delinquent during the life of the account.

dqCountYTD.description: Contains the number of times the account has been delinquent during the current year.

dqReason.description: Contains the reason the account became delinquent.

dueDate.description: Contains the date on which each scheduled payment is due to be received.

firstPaymentDueDate.description: Hold the first payment due date.

foreclosureFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account is in foreclosure.

fraudFlag.description: Contains an indicator that there is a fraud associated with the account.

graceDays.description: Contains the number of days following the scheduled due date prior to the date on which a late charge may be assessed.

internalAccountIdentifier.description: A non-predictable Account Identfier used in the Collections REST API.

jointOwned.description: Contains an indicator as to whether or not the account is jointly owned.

lastActivityDate.description: Account info 2 table last activity date.

lastBrokenPromiseDate.description: Account info 2 table last broken promise date.

lastContactDate.description: Account info 2 table last contact date.

lastPaymentDueDate.description: Contains the date on which the most recent scheduled payment was due to have been received.

lastPromiseDate.description: Account info 2 table last promise date.

lastTranAmount.description: Contains the amount of the most recent transaction.

lastTranDate.description: Contains the date on which the most recent transaction occurred.

lateChargeDay.description: Contains the day on which the late charge may be assessed to the account.

masterAccountId.description: Account info table master account id.

memberBranch.description: Contains the branch with which the member is affiliated.

newAccountFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account is a new account.

newDelinquentFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account has become delinquent.

nextContactDate.description: Contains the date scheduled for the next contact with the account.

nextContactTimeFlag.description: Account table next contact time flag.

nextContactUserId.description: Account table next contact user id.

nextDueDate.description: Contains the next scheduled due date.

numPaymDue.description: Contains the number of payments that are due.

originalLoanAmount.description: Contains the amount of the loan at origination

originalLoanDate.description: Contains the date on which the loan originated.

originalMaturityDate.description: Contains the original date on which the loan is to mature.

originalTerm.description: Contains the number of months in the original term of the loan.

paymentFrequency.description: Contains the frequency by which payments are scheduled to be received.

payoff.description: Contains the amount necessary to pay the account in full.

payoffDate.description: Contains the date to which the payoff amount is valid.

principalBalance.description: Contains the remaining unpaid principal balance of the account.

productType.description: Contains an indicator identifying the loan product type.

purposeCode.description: Contains an indicator indentifying the loan purpose.

scheduledPayment.description: Contains the amount of the scheduled payment.

workedFlag.description: Contains an indicator that the account has been worked.

isEligibleForCreditReporting.description: Collections.AccountRelationship table is eligible for credit reporting.

appraiseValue.description: Contains the value of the collateral property as defined by the appraisal.

associationCode.description: Contains the association code for the real estate.

collateralDescription2.description: Contains a continuation of a description of the collateral.

collateralDescription3.description: Contains the remainder of a description of the collateral.

collateralHoldReasonCode.description: Collections.Collateral table collateral hold reason code.

collateralTypeDescription.description: Contains information identifying the collateral type.

creditLife.description: Contains information related to credit life insurance coverage for the account.

dateTransferredToOREO.description: Collections.Collateral table date transferred to OREO.

deedUponSaleReceiptDate.description: Collections.Collateral table deed upon sales receipt date..

firstSecMortgFlag.description: Contains an indicator identifying whether the loan is a first or second mortgage.

gapInsurance.description: Contains information related to the GAP coverage for the collateral.

hazardInsuranceCode.description: Contains the hazard insurance code for the real estate.

insurance.description: Contains the name of the insurer of the automobile held as collateral.

newUsed.description: Contains information identifying whether the automoblie purchased was new or previously owned.

occupancy.description: The occupancy of the real estate.

originalValue.description: Contains the value of the collateral at loan origination.

planName.description: Contains an identification of the negotiated repayment plan.

propertyAddress.description: Contains the street address of the collateral property.

purchaseDate.description: The date the collateral was purchased.

purchasePrice.description: The amount that the collateral was purchased.

purposeCode.description: Contains an indicator identifying the purpose of the loan.

retailValue.description: Contains the retail value of the vehicle.

startingValuationForReoGainOrLoss.description: Collections.Collateral table starting valuation for REO gain or loss.

vacancyFirstKnownDate.description: Collections.Collateral table vacancy first known date.

birthDate.description: Contains the primary borrower's date of birth.

firstName.description: Contains the first name of the primary account owner.

fullName.description: Contains the full name of the primary owner.

lastName.description: Contains the last name of the primary owner.

middleName.description: Contains the middle name of the primary owner.

militaryStatusCheckDate.description: Core.Person table military status check date.

militaryStatusEndDate.description: Core.Person table military status end date.

militaryStatusStartDate.description: Core.Person table military status start date.

sourceIdentifier.description: A unique identifying value from the host system.

suffix.description: Contains the name suffix for the primary borrower (Jr., Sr, III, etc).

tin.description: Contains the primary borrower's tax identification number (SSN, EIN).

tinRaw.description: TIN value without any dashes or other non-alphanumeric characters.

amountApplied.description: Contains amount applied to the promise.

amountPaid.description: Contains amount paid on the promise.

createdDate.description: Contains the date on which the promise was opened.

dateBroken.description: Contains the date on which the promise was broken.

dateCanceled.description: Contains the date on which the promise was canceled.

datePaid.description: Contains the date on which payment was posted.

tolerance.description: Contains the tolerance expressed as a percentage.

payableAmount.description: Contains the amount that is payable.

promiseStatusId.description: Contains value related to the promise status available from a dropdown menu.

createdById.description: Contains value from a menu of user names.

address1.description: Contains the first line of the primary borrower's street address.

address2.description: Contains the second line of the primary borrower's street address.

address3.description: Contains the third line of the primary borrower's street address.

addressTypeId.description: Contains the type of the address.

city.description: Contains the name of the city in the primary borrower's address.

country.description: Contains the name of the country in the primary borrower's address.

description.description: Contains a description of the address.

postalCode.description: Contains the primary borrower's address zip code.

state.description: Contains the name of the state in the primary borrower's home address.

address.description: Contains the email address for the primary borrower.

description.description: Contains the description of the email address.

emailAddressTypeId.description: Contains the type of the email address.

description.description: Contains a description of the Phone.

phoneNumber.description: Contains the telephone number of the primary borrower.

phoneRaw.description: Phone number without any dashes or other non-alphanumeric characters.
